docs.title: Welcome to Radxa Zero 3W Documentation
docs.text:
This site provides clean, no-nonsense documentation for working with the Radxa Zero 3W.

  • Hardware Specs
  • Getting Started
  • Serial Console via FTDI
  • WiFi Setup (AIC8800)
  • Yocto Build Integration

Start with Getting Started.

docs.title: Flash OS
docs.text: Use BalenaEtcher to flash official or Yocto-based images.

docs.title: UART Serial Console
docs.text:
Use FTDI 3.3V adapter. Connect: - GND → GND - TX → RX - RX → TX

Example:

screen /dev/ttyUSB0 115200

docs.title: First Boot
docs.text: Login with default user, update packages manually.
